column4: you did the md5? and burned very slowly, doing the disk integrity check afterwards?
I checked every time and it was always non matching Md5s
this is the live cd correct? non matching md5 means a corrupt iso
I downloaded the iso many times using multiple different Torrent Clients.
the alternate may fare better when the live cd chokes
I am starting to think it is my Network connection causing these corruptions...
have you tried with quiet and splash removed as kernel parameters to see the exact errorss?
that would help a lot I imagine
It always shows the errors anyway. CRC Error and many Numbers
Thank you too for the help, I will try to download it again tonight, My ISP is a Cellular Modem and is only max download 140KB/s
if all that fails  you may wish to try the minimal iso (9mb) and build from there
Is there a tutorial on this somewhere?
on the minimal? it is quite self explanatory and uses a ncurses based installer iirc
because in order to get my Cell Phone to work as a modem I have to modprobe visor and add a bunch of scripts. and have pppd. Will this be possible on the Minimal Installer?
okay not sure about that installation method, that sounds problematic with the minimal
